bpd.name: Standard HR Open New Position
bpd.description: <HTML><HEAD> <STYLE type=text/css> p{margin:0px;}</STYLE> </HEAD> <BODY style="FONT-FAMILY: arial; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" bgColor=#f5f5f5>This process covers a manager requesting to create a new position or fill an existing position. The process routes the position request to the Human Resources (HR) department to search for candidates.</BODY></HTML>

<STYLE type=text/css> p{margin:0px;}</STYLE>
</HEAD>
<BODY style="FONT-FAMILY: arial; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" bgColor=#f5f5f5>
<P>If the&nbsp;request to create a new position, it is routed to the general mnager for review. </P><BR>
<P>If the request is to fill an existing position, it is routed directly to Human Resources to find&nbsp; candidates to fill the position. </P></BODY></HTML></ns15:documentation><ns15:extensionElements><ns13:nodeVisualInfo x="334" y="46" width="32" height="32" color="#A5B7CD" /></ns15:extensionElements><ns15:incoming>bpdid:431b0753c33842e2:3d5457c0:141a2fd3448:-7523</ns15:incoming><ns15:outgoing>bpdid:431b0753c33842e2:3d5457c0:141a2fd3448:-751b</ns15:outgoing><ns15:outgoing>bpdid:431b0753c33842e2:3d5457c0:141a2fd3448:-7513</ns15:outgoing></ns15:exclusiveGateway><ns15:exclusiveGateway default="bpdid:431b0753c33842e2:3d5457c0:141a2fd3448:-752b" gatewayDirection="Unspecified" name="GM approved?" id="bpdid:431b0753c33842e2:3d5457c0:141a2fd3448:-75d7"><ns15:documentation textFormat="text/html"><HTML><HEAD>
<STYLE type=text/css> p{margin:0px;}</STYLE>
</HEAD>
<BODY style="FONT-FAMILY: arial; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" bgColor=#f5f5f5>
<P>If the General Manager approves the requisition, it is routed to Human Resources. </P><BR>
<P>If the General Manager rejects the requisition, the hiring manager is notified of the rejection and the requisition is terminated.<BR></P></BODY></HTML></ns15:documentation><ns15:extensionElements><ns13:nodeVisualInfo x="431" y="51" width="32" height="32" color="#A5B7CD" /></ns15:extensionElements><ns15:incoming>bpdid:431b0753c33842e2:3d5457c0:141a2fd3448:-753f</ns15:incoming><ns15:outgoing>bpdid:284d4670de5ed150:6ad42ae4:14de497801a:-7fef</ns15:outgoing><ns15:outgoing>bpdid:431b0753c33842e2:3d5457c0:141a2fd3448:-752b</ns15:outgoing></ns15:exclusiveGateway><ns15:callActivity calledElement="1.ebce2203-61fa-4f04-bbaf-612480e62f47" default="bpdid:431b0753c33842e2:3d5457c0:141a2fd3448:-753f" name="Review new position request" id="bpdid:431b0753c33842e2:3d5457c0:141a2fd3448:-75d6"><ns15:documentation textFormat="text/html"><HTML><HEAD>

<BODY style="FONT-FAMILY: arial; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" bgColor=#f5f5f5>If the general manager rejects the new position request, the system notifies&nbsp;the hiring manager and the process ends. If the request is to fill an existing position, it is routed directly to Human Resources to find  candidates to fill the position.

BusinessProcessDiagram.name: Standard HR Open New Position
BusinessProcessDiagram.documentation: <HTML><HEAD> <STYLE type=text/css> p{margin:0px;}</STYLE> </HEAD> <BODY style="FONT-FAMILY: arial; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" bgColor=#f5f5f5>This process covers a manager requesting to create a new position or fill an existing position. The process routes the position request to the Human Resources (HR) department to search for candidates.</BODY></HTML>
BusinessProcessDiagram.name: Standard HR Open New Position
BusinessProcessDiagram.author: trghat581
BusinessProcessDiagram.instanceNameExpression: "Standard Employee Requisition for " + (tw.local.requisition != null ? tw.local.requisition.requester : "") + " (" + tw.system.process.name + ")"

officeIntegration.sharePointWorkspaceSiteDescription:
This site has been automatically generated for managing collaborations and documents for the Lombardi TeamWorks process instance: <#= tw.system.process.name #> <#= tw.system.process.instanceId #>
TeamWorks Link: ~APPSERVER_URL~/portal/jsp/getProcessDetails.do?bpdInstanceId=<#= tw.system.process.instanceId #>

flow.name: No approval needed --> proceed to HR

pool.name: Pool
pool.documentation: <HTML><HEAD> <STYLE type=text/css> p{margin:0px;}</STYLE> </HEAD> <BODY style="FONT-FAMILY: arial; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" bgColor=#f5f5f5>This process covers a manager requesting to create a new position or fill an existing position. The process routes the position request to the Human Resources (HR) department to search for candidates.</BODY></HTML>

flowObject.name: Submit position request
flowObject.documentation: <HTML><HEAD> <STYLE type=text/css> p{margin:0px;}</STYLE> </HEAD> <BODY style="FONT-FAMILY: arial; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" bgColor=#f5f5f5>The hiring manager submits a request hire someone for a new or existing position.</BODY></HTML>

flowObject.name: Start
flowObject.documentation: <HTML><HEAD> <STYLE type=text/css> p{margin:0px;}</STYLE> </HEAD> <BODY style="FONT-FAMILY: arial; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" bgColor=#f5f5f5>The Standard HR Open New Position process begins.</BODY></HTML>

flowObject.name: New position?
flowObject.documentation:
If the request to create a new position, it is routed to the general mnager for review.


If the request is to fill an existing position, it is routed directly to Human Resources to find  candidates to fill the position.

flowObject.name: Review new position request
flowObject.documentation: <HTML><HEAD> <STYLE type=text/css> p{margin:0px;}</STYLE> </HEAD> <BODY style="FONT-FAMILY: arial; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" bgColor=#f5f5f5>The general manager evaluates the submitted new position request and either approves it or rejects it.</BODY></HTML>

attachedEvent.name: Overdue approval
attachedEvent.documentation: <HTML><HEAD> <STYLE type=text/css> p{margin:0px;}</STYLE> </HEAD> <BODY style="FONT-FAMILY: arial; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" bgColor=#f5f5f5>If the general manager does not approve or reject the new position request by the due date, the general manager is notified.</BODY></HTML>

flowObject.name: GM approved?
flowObject.documentation:
If the General Manager approves the requisition, it is routed to Human Resources.


If the General Manager rejects the requisition, the hiring manager is notified of the rejection and the requisition is terminated.

flowObject.name: Find position candidates
flowObject.documentation: When HR receives the position request, they search for candidates.

flowObject.name: Notify hiring manager
flowObject.documentation: <HTML><HEAD> <STYLE type=text/css> p{margin:0px;}</STYLE> </HEAD> <BODY style="FONT-FAMILY: arial; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" bgColor=#f5f5f5>If the general manager rejects the new position request, the system notifies the hiring manager and the process ends. (This activity is not implemented in this sample.)</BODY></HTML>

flowObject.name: Send escalation notice
flowObject.documentation: <HTML><HEAD> <STYLE type=text/css> p{margin:0px;}</STYLE> </HEAD> <BODY style="FONT-FAMILY: arial; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" bgColor=#f5f5f5>If the general manager does not approve or reject the new position request by the due date, the system sends the general manager a notification email.(This activity is not implemented in this sample.)</BODY></HTML>

flowObject.name: End escalation
flowObject.documentation: No additional escalation notices are sent.

flowObject.name: End
flowObject.documentation: <HTML><HEAD> <STYLE type=text/css> p{margin:0px;}</STYLE> </HEAD> <BODY style="FONT-FAMILY: arial; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" bgColor=#f5f5f5>The process is complete.</BODY></HTML>

privateVariable.name: requisition
privateVariable.description: <html><body>Is the process variable for the requisition business object.</body></html>

privateVariable.name: currentPosition
privateVariable.description: <html><body>Is the process variable for the position business object for requisitions for existing positions.</body></html>

privateVariable.name: candidates
privateVariable.description: <html><body>Is the process variable that is a list of candidate business objects for prospective candidates for the position.</body></html>

note.documentation: See the Documentation field for each activity and event for information about the artifact.
